replies.msg:
兔子是應該要被絕育

根據美國兔子協會(House Rabbit Society):

1. 兔子是被捕獵動物(Prey animal), 是大自然內每個捕獵者(Predator)的目標, 狗吠聲、消防車叫聲、小孩尖叫、雷暴等也會嚇驚兔子, 所以不建議帶出外散步。兔子是全世界其中一個最多被棄養的動物(在美國排第3最多被棄養), 很多人將牠放生, 這樣會令兔子十分恐慌, 而且沒有覓食能力(寵物兔和野兔是不同), 有些人送給兔協, 但容納不到那麼龐大的數目。

2. 絕育後會大大減少因荷爾蒙控制而霸地盤，不會隨地去廁所 (兔子是不需要訓練去廁所，只要廁所內有紙棉和乾草和夠大便可以, 建議用貓廁所)

3. 荷爾蒙減少令攻擊性減少，更加溫馴和親人，也會活得更開心。如果想將2隻兔合養(做夫妻/好朋友)要先絕育才容易建立關係, 否則有機會打架！

4. 兔子是很容易患上生殖器病動物，所以絕育會令到更健康和長壽！

5. 減少過量繁殖(和棄養後所面對的困境)，繁殖得快和多。

有些人會問: 為什麼我在東, 牠會面向著西?

其實兔子側面看某東西就代表正面看某東西。牠們正前方和下方是盲點，除了這兩個盲點外，牠們幾乎可以看到360度。(所以有時食物在牠下巴下面睇唔到) 你在牠後面也會看到你。兔子只有向著前方大約30度範圍，才可以有立體影像。牠們的脊椎就像軟骨那麼脆弱, 另外也有遠視。所以佢地唔係無視你，你是在他們視線範圍之內。

兔子🐰是親人的群體性動物，但身體語言與其他動物不同，要做些研究才理解。(推介最底的3個網站)

親人的動物：
https://youtu.be/Maovq8Vz1LM
https://youtu.be/pyL0yEs-ka8

兔子的行為解釋網站：

香港兔協: http://www.hkrabbit.org/knowledge8_ch.php

美國兔協 House Rabbit Society (教育網站): http://rabbit.org

詳盡身體語言解釋(喜怒哀樂): http://rabbitspeak.com

兔子拚命地拯救一隻被困住的貓! 真感人! ☺

兔子是一種好心境平靜的動物，很多人覺得牠們咀嚼食物的聲音很治癒。如果你家的兔子有攻擊性，這不是牠的本性，而是後天環境和飼養方式影響。兔子亦被作為情緒和心靈支持動物(emotional support animal)，即是主人有醫生的證明，帶着小動物作伴，心靈才得到慰藉。
https://youtu.be/ydwwZtQyuiU

replies.msg: 捉你老豆去絕育啦柒頭
推你老母閪咩絕育白卡佬

Rabbits are prey animals which means they're everybody else's lunch in nature. A dog barking, a child shouting, an airplane roaring overhead, an ambulance siren wailing and a lightning storm can frighten rabbits. Therefore taking a rabbit on a leash isn't recommended. Indoor rabbits have a much longer lifespan than outdoor rabbits because they're protected from poor weather conditions and enemies. They feel safe, protected, monitored, sheltered and that they're part of the family. The average lifespan of an indoor house rabbits are eight to fourteen years whereas the average lifespan of a rabbit kept in an outdoor hutch and cage are three to six years. The happiest rabbit expression is called binky. When a rabbit binkies it jumps into the air and twists its head and body in the opposite direction before falling back to the ground. A happy rabbit even twirls, flops, shakes its head and stretches its legs. All these are telling you that it's happy and overall pleased with you and its life. Rabbits produce two types of pellets: fecal pellets and cecal pellets (aka cecotropes) The former are the dry round ones you usually see in the litterbox while the latter are edible for rabbits which contain essential nutrients. Rabbits are one of the most abandoned pets in the world. In fact it's the third most abandoned pets in the United states because so many people do not understand rabbits and think that rabbits are boring and that they don't bond with humans. Rabbits are highly intelligent social and affectionate animals. While they dont like to be picked up from the ground they'd much rather be cuddled and petted while they're on the ground or in your lap. When people say they want to have a pet rabbit I usually advise them to visit the rabbit society and choose a bunny for adoption.
你老母，而家咩時候仲係講養兔飲飲食食 fuck
